props.name: open
props.docblock: specifies whether the modal renders open or closed on the initial render. It defaults to false.

description.text: specifies whether the modal renders open or closed on the initial render. It defaults to false.

props.name: parentSelector
props.docblock: is the selector for an element in the dom which the modal should be rendered under. It uses querySelector to find the first element that matches that selector, and then creates a react portal to a div underneath the parent element.

description.text: is the selector for an element in the dom which the modal should be rendered under. It uses querySelector to find the first element that matches that selector, and then creates a react portal to a div underneath the parent element.

props.name: title
props.docblock: a string or an element that is rendered inside of the modal title, above the modal body.

description.text: a string or an element that is rendered inside of the modal title, above the modal body.

props.name: body
props.docblock: a string or an element that is rendered inside of the modal body, between the title and the footer.

description.text: a string or an element that is rendered inside of the modal body, between the title and the footer.

props.name: buttons
props.docblock: an array of either elements or shapes that take the form of the buttonPropTypes. See the [buttonPropTypes](https://github.com/openedx/paragon/blob/master/src/Button/index.jsx#L40) for a list of acceptable props to pass as part of a button.

description.text: an array of either elements or shapes that take the form of the buttonPropTypes. See the [buttonPropTypes](https://github.com/openedx/paragon/blob/master/src/Button/index.jsx#L40) for a list of acceptable props to pass as part of a button.

props.name: closeText
props.docblock: specifies the display text of the default Close button. It defaults to "Close".

description.text: specifies the display text of the default Close button. It defaults to "Close".

props.name: onClose
props.docblock: a function that is called on close. It can be used to perform actions upon closing of the modal, such as restoring focus to the previous logical focusable element.

description.text: a function that is called on close. It can be used to perform actions upon closing of the modal, such as restoring focus to the previous logical focusable element.

props.name: renderDefaultCloseButton
props.docblock: specifies whether the default close button is rendered in the footer. It defaults to true.

description.text: specifies whether the default close button is rendered in the footer. It defaults to true.

props.name: renderHeaderCloseButton
props.docblock: specifies whether a close button is rendered in the modal header. It defaults to true.

description.text: specifies whether a close button is rendered in the modal header. It defaults to true.

props.name: dialogClassName
props.docblock: Specifies optional classes to add to the element with the '.modal-dialog' class.  See Bootstrap documentation for possible classes.  Some options: modal-lg, modal-sm, modal-dialog-centered

description.text: Specifies optional classes to add to the element with the '.modal-dialog' class.  See Bootstrap documentation for possible classes.  Some options: modal-lg, modal-sm, modal-dialog-centered
